Uses of Class
generation.BSPNode

Packages that use BSPNode
Package
Description
generation
This package contains classes used in the generation and representation of a maze.
gui
This package contains classes to establish the GUI for the maze game.

  • Uses of BSPNode in generation

    Subclasses of BSPNode in generation
    Modifier and Type
    Class
    Description
    class 
    BSPBranch
    BSPNodes are used to build a binary tree, where internal nodes keep track of lower and upper bounds of (x,y) coordinates.
    class 
    BSPLeaf
    A leaf node for a tree of BSPNodes.
